member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.TickPlacement
member.summary: Tick placement determines where to draw tick marks in relation to the track.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.TickPlacement.BottomRight
member.summary: Tick marks can be placed either below the track in horizontal orientation or right of the track in vertical orientation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.TickPlacement.Inline
member.summary: Ticks are placed along the track.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.TickPlacement.None
member.summary: No Tick marks along the track.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.TickPlacement.Outside
member.summary: Tick marks are placed on both sides of the track either in horizontal or vertical orientation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.TickPlacement.TopLeft
member.summary: Tick marks are placed either above the track in horizontal orientation or left of the track in vertical orientation.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.Orientation
member.summary: Orientation property has the following two options.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.Orientation.Horizontal
member.summary: In this orientation, the values and the slider are set horizontally.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.Orientation.Vertical
member.summary: In this Orientation, the values and the slider are set vertically.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.ValuePlacement
member.summary: Value placement describes the position of the Value respective to ticks.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.ValuePlacement.TopLeft
member.summary: Values are placed either above the track in horizontal orientation or left of the track in vertical orientation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.ValuePlacement.BottomRight
member.summary: Values can be placed either below the track in horizontal orientation or right of the track in vertical orientation.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.SnapsTo
member.summary: Snaps to determines whether the RangeSlider snaps to steps or ticks.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.SnapsTo.StepValues
member.summary: The StepFrequency property will be used to specify the interval between snap points.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.SnapsTo.Ticks
member.summary: The TickFrequency property will be used to specify the interval between snap points.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.SnapsTo.None
member.summary: The thumb is moved independent of any values.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.ToolTipPlacement
member.summary: ToolTip Placement is used to control the position of the tooltip in relation to the thumb.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.ToolTipPlacement.TopLeft
member.summary: The Tooltip will be placed either above the Thumb in horizontal orientation or left of the Thumb in vertical orientation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.ToolTipPlacement.BottomRight
member.summary: The Tooltip will be placed either below the Thumb in horizontal orientation or right of the Thumb in vertical orientation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.ToolTipPlacement.None
member.summary: Tooltip will be collapsed.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.LabelPlacement
member.summary: Label placement describes the position of the labels respective to ticks.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.LabelPlacement.TopLeft
member.summary: Labels are placed either above the track in horizontal orientation or left of the track in vertical orientation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRangeSlider.XForms.LabelPlacement.BottomRight
member.summary: Labels can be placed either below the track in horizontal orientation or right of the track in vertical orientation.
